title: UIDT v3.7.2: Constructive Proof of Yang-Mills Mass Gap
description: Complete submission package for the Yang-Mills Existence and Mass Gap Problem. Contains manuscript, verification code, Monte Carlo data, and reproducibility infrastructure. v3.7.1 ERRATUM: Following Lattice 2024 findings (Morningstar 2025, arXiv:2502.02547), the spectral gap Î”* = 1.710 GeV is explicitly identified as the spectral gap of pure Yang-Mills theory, not an observable particle mass. All lattice comparisons reference quenched (pure gauge) simulations. Mathematical proofs remain unchanged.

results.interpretation: Spectral gap of pure Yang-Mills Hamiltonian

erratum.summary: Physical interpretation clarified following Lattice 2024 findings
